translation:
Friend Sir

The 158$880 can either be debited by us, or received from the State on behalf of those who requested it, and it is included in the last loan, to be paid from the first available funds: therefore, it is at your discretion what you wish. As for the account of Paulo Vicente, I do not know who he is, but if you tell me, I will then be able to respond regarding what is required in that respect. You may dispose of the

Your sincere very thankful friend Almeida Piratini, November 10, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir Carlos Fernandez de Quincoze. Your House.
